Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us. Considering its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this exceptional item to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production and distribution but also the recognition of its true worth to you. We are confident that you will find this investment worthwhile. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
